name: places/ChIJDZvBb5v2wokRfNwzClt1FSE
formattedAddress: 635 W 165th St, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 635 W 165th St, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text:
I wish I could give Dr. Bradley Miller, M.D. a negative one star review. Not only has he prescribed me medicine based on listening to me speak for 1 minute (and interrupted me ten times in between) but he has also called me back over 4 days later when I texted / emailed / called (via Spruce and direct) telling him it was not 911 urgent but very important he call me ASAP. As his autoreply says he WILL 100% follow up the following business day. Not only that but he then tried to call 911 after illegally calling me back X days after, and attempted to admit me to a TERRIBLE psych ward without listening to my story.

He does not take insurance and will only see the 1% of the population - he doesn't see the people who REALLY need him - the 99% and he charges over $350 for a FIFTEEN MINUTE phone call with him. $350++++!!!!!

He only recommends you to go to Columbia - his employer - bc it will make him and his employer more money - and all he cares about is that your money is green - not your mental health, clearly.

STAY AWAY FROM THIS MAN IF YOU CARE ABOUT YOUR MENTAL HEALTH, WELL BEING OR THAT OF YOUR FAMILY.
